thread.title: Intel sells game physics company Havok to Microsoft
thread.title_full: Intel sells game physics company Havok to Microsoft

title: Intel sells game physics company Havok to Microsoft
text:
Intel sells game physics company Havok to Microsoft 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
Microsoft loves acquisitions, so it's no surprise that the company has purchased Havok, the leader in 3D gaming physics. Read more
